description: Astrophotographer Brennan Gilmore captured a rare “disconnection event” on Oct. 2, showing solar wind cutting Comet Lemmon’s glowing green ion tail. The comet, nearing its October 2025 flyby, displayed a vivid coma and long tail—revealing how solar activity reshapes comets in real time.
title: Solar Wind Cuts Comet Lemmon’s Tail In Rare Disconnection Event

description: SpaceX’s Starship Flight 11 marked the final mission of the V2 design, achieving flawless launch and recovery. The next-gen V3 Starship will feature new Raptor 3 engines, advanced docking systems, and upgraded booster recovery—critical milestones as SpaceX prepares for its upcoming Mars fleet and NASA’s Artemis III lunar landing.
title: SpaceX Eyes V3 Rocket With Raptor 3 Engines After Wrapping Starship V2 Tests

description: Astronomers propose the existence of ‘Planet Y’, a hidden Earth-size planet that may orbit closer than the theorized ‘Planet Nine’. Based on Kuiper Belt object patterns, the study suggests a rocky world influencing orbital tilts. Experts remain divided, but upcoming sky surveys could soon confirm or rule out its existence.
title: Astronomers Detect Hints Of Hidden Earth-Sized Planet Beyond Neptune

description: Caltech and Abu Dhabi’s TII have introduced X1, a humanoid robot integrated with a transforming drone that can walk, drive, and fly. Demonstrated on Caltech’s campus, the system showcases adaptive mobility for emergencies. Future upgrades will add AI-driven autonomy, aiming to make robots more reliable for complex rescue missions.
title: Caltech Unveils X1 Robot-Drone Hybrid Capable Of Walking, Driving And Flying

description: Get ready for a gripping thriller as the sixth instalment of the Final Destination franchise, Final Destination Bloodlines, is all set to premiere OTT. It is one of the most anticipated thrillers of recent months, starring Kaityln Santa Juana. The movie is set for its OTT debut on Jio Hotstar tomorrow, October 16.
title: Final Destination Bloodlines to Be Available for Streaming on JioHotstar Soon: What You Need to Know

description: Honor Earbuds 4 feature a traditional in-ear design with a dual-tone finish and touch controls, including volume adjustment via slide controls. They use 11mm + 6mm titanium-plated dynamic drivers and support up to 50dB ANC with dual transparency mode. The earbuds include in-ear detection, AI three-mic noise reduction, and 20Hz–20kHz frequency response. With Bluetooth 5.3 and dual-device connectivity, they are claimed to offer up to nine hours per charge and 46 hours with the case. The IP54-rated dust and splash-resistant earbuds support quick charging and the Honor Smart Space App.
title: Honor Earbuds 4 Launched With Up to 50dB ANC, Up to 46 Hours of Total Battery Life: Price, Features

description: Oppo offered a preview of the Android 16-based ColorOS 16 user interface on Wednesday. The new version will debut on the upcoming Find X9 Series smartphones. ColorOS 16 introduces a refreshed UI, new animations and offers personalisation options. The company is using Luminous Rendering Engine and the Trinity Engine to ensure fluidity and smoothness in the new operating system.
title: Oppo Unveils ColorOS 16 Update Based on Android 16; Will Debut in India With Oppo Find X9 Series

description: A new study proposes detecting gravitational-wave “beats” using pulsar timing. Researchers from Hirosaki University suggest that interference between waves from supermassive black hole binaries could appear as periodic variations in pulsar signals. The method may help distinguish individual sources from a diffuse gravitational-wave background in upcoming observations.
title: Pulsar Observations Could Reveal Gravitational Wave Interference From Black Holes

description: Australian researchers have tested new bite-resistant wetsuits that minimize injuries from shark bites. The materials, made with chain mail, Kevlar, and nanofibers, help reduce bleeding and improve safety for surfers and divers. The innovation marks a step forward in shark bite protection without limiting flexibility underwater.
title: Researchers Develop Wetsuits That Protect Against Shark Bites And Stings

description: A rare discovery in deep space has stunned astronomers: twin radio rings surrounding a galaxy about 7 billion light-years away. Known as an odd radio circle (ORC), this is the most distant and powerful ever found. Citizen scientists first spotted it, and LOFAR confirmed its existence, opening new insights into galactic and black hole evolution.
title: Astronomers Discover Most Distant And Powerful Odd Radio Circle In The Universe

description: Global crypto platform Coinbase has invested in India’s leading exchange CoinDCX, valuing it at $2.45 billion (roughly Rs. 21,600 crore). The deal strengthens Coinbase’s presence in India and the Middle East, where crypto adoption is rising rapidly. The investment supports regional growth, regulatory compliance, and secure trading, positioning both firms to expand access to digital assets across South Asia’s fast-growing crypto ecosystem.
title: Coinbase Invests in CoinDCX at $2.45 Billion Valuation

description: Honor has launched the MagicPad 3 Pro and MagicPad 3 12.5 tablets in China. The MagicPad 3 Pro features a 13.3-inch 3.2K LCD with a 165Hz refresh rate, a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, 16GB RAM, 512GB storage, and a 12,450mAh battery with 80W fast charging. The MagicPad 3 12.5 has a 12.5-inch 3K LCD screen, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, 12GB RAM, and a 10,100mAh battery with 66W charging. Both tablets run MagicOS 10 based on Android 16 and support YOYO AI features.
title: Honor MagicPad 3 Pro Launched With 12,450mAh Battery, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC Alongside MagicPad 3 12.5

description: Honor Watch 5 Pro was unveiled in China on Wednesday during the tech firm’s October 2025 launch event. The company also launched its flagship smartphone lineup, dubbed the Honor Magic 8 series. Apart from the phones, the Magic Pad 3 and Magic 3 Pro also debuted in the country. The new smartwatch features sleep apnoea detection, Sleep monitoring, and heart rate monitoring.
title: Honor Watch 5 Pro Launched With Sleep Apnoea Detection, Heart Rate Monitoring: See Price, Specifications

description: Mission Drishti is set to take off in the first quarter of 2026, which will explore Earth in a manner that has never been done before. It weighs 160 kg and is the highest-resolution satellite ever made in the history of the country.
title: Indian Startup GalaxEye Announces Mission Drishti, to Deliver Real-Time Earth Imaging From 2026

description: iPad Pro with the M5 chip has arrived in India, along with the new MacBook Pro. The flagship tablet is set to go on sale in the country via Apple's website, offline Apple retail stores, and other retailers on October 22. It will be available in four storage options and two size variants. The base model sports an 11-inch OLED display with 256GB of onboard storage.
title: iPad Pro With M5 Chip, Up to 13-Inch OLED Display Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: Kishkindhapuri is a chilling Telugu horror film directed by Koushik Pegallapati, starring Bellamkonda Sai Sreenivas and Anupama Parameswaran. Set around a haunted radio station, the movie combines supernatural suspense and emotional storytelling. After its successful theatrical run, it will begin streaming exclusively on ZEE5 this month.
title: Kishkindhapuri OTT Release Date: Know When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Netflix’s Tamil original show Legacy stars R. Madhavan and Nimisha Sajayan in a gritty crime saga about an aging mafia patriarch fighting to preserve his family empire. Blending emotion and tension, it explores themes of loyalty, betrayal, and the relentless pursuit of power. The first look of the series has been on Netflix, and it sets a furious and dark theme, with an intense tone.
title: Legacy OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch the R. Madhavan-Starrer Online

description: Apple has updated its 14-inch MacBook Pro with its new M5 chip, offering up to 3.5x better AI and 1.6x better GPU performance than the previous M4 model. It features a 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 24-hour battery life, faster SSD storage, a 12-megapixel Center Stage camera, Touch ID, and MagSafe 3, while the laptop is also available in different variant with an optional nano-texture finish.
title: MacBook Pro With M5 Chip, 14.2-Inch Liquid Retina XDR Display Launched in India: Price Specifications

description: Sujeeth’s directorial They Call Him OG had a great run at the box office. It stars Pawan Kalyan in the lead role, who portrays Ojas Gambheera, who comes out of his retirement while the crime in Mumbai goes unchecked. They Call Him OG is speculated to be released on Netflix on October 23. Viewers will require a paid subscription to the streaming service to watch the film online.
title: Pawan Kalyan-Starrer They Call Him OG OTT Release: When, Where to Watch Action-Crime Film Online

description: Researchers from IISc and Caltech have solved a decades-old mystery in photosynthesis, explaining why electrons move through only one pathway. The discovery could help build efficient artificial energy systems.
title: Scientists Solve Decades-Old Photosynthesis Puzzle With IISc–Caltech Study

description: A burst of solar activity could soon paint Earth’s skies with auroras. Between October 11 and 13, the Sun fired four coronal mass ejections toward Earth, expected to arrive October 15–17. NOAA predicts mild G1 geomagnetic storms that could trigger colorful northern lights visible across high and even mid-latitude regions.
title: Solar Storm From Four Sun Eruptions Could Cause Minor Geomagnetic Activity

description: YouTuber Zack Nelson from JerryRigEverything tested the Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold in his durability series, where the foldable’s battery exploded and emitted smoke during a bend test. Nelson had also questioned the phone’s IP68 rating, noting the hinge isn’t dust-resistant. He criticised Google’s claims of improved durability, stating the device showed no progress over previous models. The explosion marked the first in his 10 years of testing, especially disappointing given that the Galaxy Z Fold 7 passed the same test without damage.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Explodes During YouTuber's Durability Test

description: Honor Magic 8 Pro has been launched in China alongside the Honor Magic 8 Pro. Latest smartphones run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. They are launched in four colour options with up to 16GB RAM and maximum 1TB of storage.
title: Honor Magic 8, Magic 8 Pro Launched With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 Chipset: Price, Specifications

description: Lokah Chapter 1: Chandra, starring Kalyani Priyadarshan, is a Malayalam superhero film premiering on JioHotstar. The story follows Chandra, an immortal being, as she battles dark forces and navigates moral dilemmas. The film combines Indian mythology with modern storytelling, marking the start of an exciting cinematic universe. It will be released on JioHotstar on October 20.
title: Lokah Chapter 1: Chandra OTT Release: When, Where to Watch Malayalam-Language Fantasy Thriller Online

description: YouTuber Zack Nelson from JerryRigEverything tested the Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold in his durability series, where the foldable’s battery exploded and emitted smoke during a bend test. Nelson had also questioned the phone’s IP68 rating, noting the hinge isn’t dust-resistant. He criticised Google’s claims of improved durability, stating the device showed no progress over previous models. The explosion marked the first in his 10 years of testing, especially disappointing given that the Galaxy Z Fold 7 passed the same test without damage.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Explodes During YouTuber's Durability Test

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite could be launched in India soon. Although Nothing is yet to make an official confirmation, an unknown Nothing smartphone with a model number A001T has reportedly appeared on the Bureau of Indian Standards (BIS) website. The model is believed to be the Nothing Phone 3a Lite.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite BIS Listing Hints at Imminent India Launch
OPPO F31 Line-Up Brings Snapdragon, Dimensity Chips With a 7,000mAh 5-Year Battery

description: WhatsApp is said to be testing a new feature on its Android beta that notifies users when selected contacts post new status updates. Users can enable alerts directly from a contact’s status via the overflow menu and mute them anytime. Notifications show the contact’s name and a small preview for image or video statuses, allowing quick updates without opening the app. The feature prioritises important contacts and keeps alerts private.
title: WhatsApp Begins Testing Status Update Notifications on Android: Report

description: Assassin's Creed executive producer and VP, Marc-Alexis Coté, has reportedly left Ubisoft after the launch of the Tencent-backed Vantage Studios. The executive reportedly had different expectations and priorities related to Vantage and declined a leadership role at the subsidiary. Vantage, which was launched earlier this month, handles Assassin's Creed, Far Cry, and Rainbow Six franchises.
title: Assassin's Creed Boss Marc-Alexis Coté Exits Ubisoft After Launch of New Tencent-Backed Subsidiary

description: Google’s viral Nano Banana AI model, used over 500 million times globally, is expanding to Google Lens and AI Mode in Search. Starting with users in India and the US, the model will let them perform AI-powered image edits directly from these interfaces. Google says more countries and languages will gain access soon.
title: Google Expands Nano Banana Image Editing Model to Lens and AI Mode

description: Google Photos has showcased 10 new ways its AI tools can transform images, from removing reflections to changing outfits or decor. These Ask Photos features let users simply describe the edit they want in text or voice prompts. However, they’re currently limited to select US users aged 18 and above with English (US) language settings.
title: Google Photos Shares 10 Different Ways AI Features Can Edit Users’ Images

description: iQOO Neo 11 is confirmed to launch in China soon. iQOO shared the first official teaser of the upcoming phone on Wednesday. The teaser reveals the design of the phone. It is currently available for pre-order in China. It is said to feature a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset under the hood. It could get a 7,500mAh battery with 100W fast charging support.
title: iQOO Neo 11 Confirmed to Launch Soon; Company Teases Design as Pre-Reservations Begin

description: Microsoft on Tuesday released the final update for Windows 10. The operating system (OS), which was released in 2015, reached its end-of-life period on October 14, after which it will not be eligible for any new security updates. As per Microsoft, the latest and final update for Windows 10 brings fixes for issues related to Input and Composition, Windows Remote Management (WinRM), and the Fax modem driver.
title: Microsoft Releases Final Windows 10 Update With Bug Fixes, Security Patches; 'Big' Windows Announcement Teased

description: YouTube, in a blog post on Tuesday, revealed that it will start rolling out a new dedicated video shelf for teenagers with mental health and wellbeing content. The company has collaborated with various institutions, organisations, and experts who have expertise in providing mental health information to teenagers. YouTube said that the mental health tools will first be introduced in US, the UK, Canada, Mexico, France, and Australia. Meanwhile, other countries might receive the update later.
title: YouTube Launches Mental Health and Wellbeing Section for Teenagers With Specialised Content

description: Apple’s smart home hub could launch in 2026. It is expected to come with a 7-inch display and an integrated FaceTime camera. The device could support Apple Intelligence features. The smart home hub could cost around $350 (roughly Rs. 30,000). The company is said to be planning to expand its manufacturing hub in Vietnam, in partnership with BYD.
title: Apple's Smart Home Hub Slated to Launch in 2026 With $350 Price Tag: Report

description: After a brief sell-off, the crypto market saw renewed stability as traders reacted to Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s comments suggesting potential rate easing. Bitcoin recovered to the $112,000 mark (roughly Rs. 98.9 lakh), while Ethereum hovered near $4,000 (roughly Rs. 3.5 lakh). Analysts said Powell’s remarks helped restore optimism, despite lingering concerns over global trade tensions and inflationary pressures.
title: Bitcoin Price Rebounds to $112,000 as US Fed Chair’s Comments Spark Hope of Rate Cuts

description: OpenAI is reportedly developing a ChatGPT experience tailored for adults. CEO Sam Altman said the company is easing restrictions for verified adults, allowing the chatbot to adopt personalities and even engage in erotic conversations. Altman clarified that these features will remain opt-in and possible only after strict safeguards for minors, including age estimation and parental controls.
title: OpenAI Prepares Adult-Only ChatGPT With Personalities and Erotic Roleplay Options

description: Oppo Find X9 Pro and Find X9 are confirmed to launch in India next month with the MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset and the Android 16-based ColorOS 16. While the company has yet to announce the exact India launch date, a tipster has reportedly shared the same online. The upcoming flagship lineup is scheduled to debut in China on October 16. It is confirmed to carry a Hasselblad-branded rear camera module, with a 200-megapixel telephoto periscope sensor.
title: Oppo Find X9 Series Launch Date in India Leaked, Along With Key Specifications, Pricing

description: Samsung on Wednesday announced a Galaxy event for October. The South Korean tech conglomerate will unveil a new category of artificial intelligence (AI)-native devices, with its long-awaited Project Moohan at the forefront. It is Samsung’s first extended reality (XR) headset which was first announced at a Galaxy event in 2024. While specifications remain under wraps, Project Moohan is teased to support multimodal AI capabilities and run on Android XR.
title: Samsung Announces Galaxy Event for October 21; Project Moohan XR Headset to Debut

description: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold may launch beyond China and South Korea, with the UAE confirmed as a market and the US and Vietnam likely to follow, according to recent leaks. The device’s rollout suggests Samsung is confident in its performance and aims to reach a wider audience. While the TriFold could debut at Samsung’s October 21 Galaxy event alongside Project Moohan, reports also indicate a potential launch between October 31 and November 1 during the APEC summit in South Korea.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z TriFold Said to Launch in the US, UAE, China and South Korea

description: Spotify will bring its video podcasts to Netflix starting in early 2026 through a new global partnership. The collaboration will feature select titles from Spotify Studios and The Ringer, including The Bill Simmons Podcast and The Rewatchables, with more shows to follow. The move supports Spotify’s push into video podcasting, creator monetisation, and interactive features like polls and Q&As. While financial terms remain undisclosed, both companies said the deal marks the beginning of a broader cross-platform expansion.
title: Spotify Partners Netflix to Bring Video Podcasts to Streaming Platform in 2026

description: The date and venue for Summer Game Fest 2026 have been announced. The annual games showcase will take place on June 5, 2026, producer and host Geoff Keighley confirmed Tuesday. The event will take place at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles, with public tickets going on sale in spring 2026.
title: Summer Game Fest Sets June 2026 Date for Next Edition, Confirms Venue Change

description: YouTube has announced new features and visual updates to its platform. With the latest update, adding videos to playlists or the Watch Later queue has been made quicker. Additionally, tapping the like button on select content will now trigger small animations. The update brings a new video player with updated controls and new icons. The updates are rolling out across the web, mobile app, and TV platforms starting this week.
title: YouTube Updated With Redesigned Video Player, Like Button Animations and Threaded Replies in Conversations

description: Realme GT 8 series, including the Realme GT 8 Pro and the standard Realme GT 8, was recently confirmed to launch this month. The Chinese smartphone maker has been teasing the camera specifications of the handset for a while, too. Now, the company has announced the exact launch date of the upcoming flagship Realme GT 8 series. The handsets in the lineup will feature a swappable camera module, giving users the option to switch between three camera modules.
title: Realme GT 8, Realme GT8 Pro Launch Date Announced: Expected Price, Specifications and Features

description: Apple is gearing up to refresh its laptop and tablet product categories this month. While details about the launch are under wraps, a company official has now teased the launch of a new MacBook model on social media. As per a seasoned journalist, this could be a hint towards the M5 MacBook Pro, whose debut is said to be on the cards. It may be introduced alongside two other new products, although Apple is unlikely to host a dedicated October event.
title: Apple Teases M5 MacBook Pro Launch Ahead of October Event: What to Expect

description: Moto X70 Air was announced on Tuesday ahead of its launch in China later this month. With the new handset, Motorola has jumped on the bandwagon of introducing ultra-thin smartphones, joining companies like Apple, Honor, Samsung, and Tecno. The Moto X70 Air comes in at a hair under 6mm. It is powered by a Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 chipset and packs a 4,800mAh battery.
title: Moto X70 Air Announced With Snapdragon 7 Gen 4 Chipset, 4,800mAh Battery: Availability, Specifications

description: Global coral reefs have reached a tipping point due to surging temperatures, warning of irreversible climate impacts on ecosystems and humans alike.
title: Earth May Have Crossed Its First Climate Tipping Point as Coral Reefs Collapse

description: Honor Magic 8 series is all set to be launched today (October 15) in China. The upcoming lineup is expected to comprise two models — Honor Magic 8 and Honor Magic 8 Pro. In the days leading up to the launch, the China-based OEM has been teasing details about the smartphones. The Honor Magic 8 series will be available in golden clouds at dawn and azure glaze (translated from Chinese) shades. Both handsets will run on MagicOS 10 based on Android 16.
title: Honor Magic 8, Honor Magic 8 Pro Launching Today: Know Price, Features and Specifications

description: Physicists have recreated the long-predicted Terrell-Penrose effect using ultra-fast lasers, showing how objects at near-light speed appear rotated rather than flattened. The experiment offers a visual insight into Einstein’s special relativity.
title: Physicists Recreate Einstein’s Near-Light-Speed Illusion Predicted 70 Years Ago

description: A new pre-print study proposes that Uranus and Neptune might not be “ice giants” after all. Using assumption-free models, scientists found their interiors could range from mostly icy to mostly rocky, suggesting we know far less about these distant worlds and that new missions are essential to solve the mystery.
title: Uranus and Neptune May Be More Rock Than Ice, New Research Suggests
